mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `twd_bbs`.`articles` (`user_email`, `board_id`, `title`, `content`, `thumbnail`, `thumbnail_type`, `view`, `written_on`, `modified_on`) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{boardId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnail}, #{thumbnailType}, #{view}, IFNULL(#{writtenOn}, DEFAULT(`written_on`)), IFNULL(#{modifiedOn}, DEFAULT(`modified_on`)))
mapper.select: SELECT `article`.`index` AS 'index', `article`.`user_email` AS 'userEmail', `article`.`board_id` AS 'boardId', `article`.`title` AS 'title', `article`.`content` AS 'content', `article`.`view` AS 'view', `article`.`written_on` AS 'writtenOn', `article`.`modified_on` AS 'modifiedOn', `location`.`latitude` AS 'latitude', `location`.`longitude` AS 'longitude', `location`.`address` AS 'address', (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `twd_bbs`.`article_likes` AS `articleLike` WHERE `articleLike`.`article_index` = `article`.`index`) AS 'likeCount', (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `twd_bbs`.`comments` AS `comment` WHERE `comment`.`article_index` = `article`.`index`) AS 'commentCount', (#{email} IS NOT NULL) AS 'isSigned', COUNT(`articleLikeMine`.`user_email`) > 0 AS 'isMine' FROM `twd_bbs`.`articles` AS `article` LEFT JOIN `twd_bbs`.`location` AS `location` ON `article`.`index` = `location`.`article_index` LEFT JOIN `twd_bbs`.`article_likes` AS `articleLikeMine` ON `articleLikeMine`.`user_email` = #{email} AND `article`.`index` = `articleLikeMine`.`article_index` WHERE `location`.`latitude` BETWEEN ${minLat} AND ${maxLat} AND `location`.`longitude` BETWEEN ${minLng} AND ${maxLng} GROUP BY `article`.`index`

SELECT `article`.`index` AS 'index', `article`.`user_email` AS 'userEmail', `article`.`board_id` AS 'boardId', `article`.`title` AS 'title', `article`.`content` AS 'content', `article`.`view` AS 'view', `article`.`written_on` AS 'writtenOn', `article`.`modified_on` AS 'modifiedOn', `location`.`address` AS 'address', `location`.`latitude` AS 'latitude', `location`.`longitude` AS 'longitude' FROM `twd_bbs`.`articles` AS `article` LEFT JOIN `twd_bbs`.`location` ON `article`.`index` = `location`.`article_index` WHERE `article`.`index` = #{index}

SELECT `index` AS 'index', `article_index` AS 'articleIndex', `address` AS 'address', `latitude` AS 'latitude', `longitude` AS 'longitude' FROM `twd_bbs`.`location` WHERE article_index = #{articleIndex}
